no.hig.haalaptob.irc
Class SortedServers

java.lang.Object
  no.hig.haalaptob.irc.SortedServers

public class SortedServers
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the information from the customized server information file ("ServerCustomInfo.txt" by default). The class will detect servers with the same group name and keep those under same group under the same arrays. It also have the needed information to add or edit server manually and to sort the available servers descending

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lap

Method Detail

findGroupposistion

public int findGroupposistion(java.lang.String s)
This function checks if a groupname is already in use by receiving a string to compare to the array

Parameters:
s - The String we want to check if its already in use
Returns:
An Integer indicating where the string name is in used if found, or else return 0;

EditServerInfo

public void EditServerInfo(int first,
                           int second,
                           java.lang.String newInfo)
This function will overwrite old information with new information entered by the user

Parameters:
first - Tells what group name the server belong to
second - Tells what position it has in the array
newInfo - Overwrites the old information with the edited one

DeleteAServer

public java.lang.Boolean DeleteAServer(int first,
                                       int second)
This function handle the removal of a server. If the server was the last server under a group name, it will also handle the deleting of the group name.

Parameters:
first - Tells what group name the server belong to
second - Tells what position it has in the array
Returns:
true if a server and a group was deleted, false if it was just a server

delete

public void delete()
This function will delete the previously arrays so all the old information will be deleted by auto garbage collector

NextAvaibleSecond

public int NextAvaibleSecond(int first)
This function check what's the next available array position under a existing group

Parameters:
first - Tells what group name the server belong to
Returns:
An Integer that tells witch position to use

Readin

public void Readin(java.lang.String name)
This function will read from the customized server information file and arrange the servers under the same group name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the file, (default name is "ServerCustomInfo.txt")

AddNewServer

public void AddNewServer(java.lang.String info)
This function handles adding a new server information manually created by the users. If an existing group matches the user typed group name, it will be placed in that array. Or else a new group will be created

Parameters:
info - information about the new server.

SizeOfUsedList

public int SizeOfUsedList()
This function checks how many groups that exist

Returns:
the number of existing groups

sizeOfUsedSecondGroupArray

public int sizeOfUsedSecondGroupArray(int first)
This function checks how many position that is in used under a specified group name

Parameters:
first - tells what group we want to check
Returns:
An Integer that tells how many position that is currently in use

returnUsedList

public java.lang.String[] returnUsedList()
This function will extract all the existing groupname and return it to the caller

Returns:
an array that contains all the existing group names

getChannelArrayinfo

public javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel getChannelArrayinfo(int first)
This function is used by JComboBoxes that displays the servers under a specified group name by returning all the name of servers available under that group

Parameters:
first - Tells what group we are interested inn
Returns:
All the server information under that group name as a DefaultComboBoxModel so the Combobox can be updated easlier
